categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Sundog referred to a pair of Corellian CR90 corvettes that served with the Alliance to Restore the Republic's fleet. They were assigned to bring fresh troops to the defecting Imperial Admiral Harkov aboard his Victory-class Star Destroyer Protector. They were, however, destroyed with all hands by Imperial TIE/LN starfighter ace Maarek Stele before reinforcements could arrive.
